name: 2nd International Conference and Expo on Materials Science and Nanoscience
content: To promote current research outcomes within the research communities to enhance their current knowledge in the field of Materials Science and to discover new trends for future applications which are safer, cheaper and easier, OLC International is organizing the 2nd International Conference and Expo on Materials Science and Nanoscience will be held during October 25-27, 2021 in Cologne, Germany. The theme of the conference is “Exploring Recent Advances in Composite Materials for a Resilient Future”. The conference aims at sharing new ideas, possibilities and latest technological advances among students, professionals, researchers, scientists and industrialists in the field of nanoscience for providing better solutions to everyday challenges. The conference focuses on recent innovations and applications in Materials Science and includes technical sessions and interactive discussions. It will host world-class researchers, high-profile plenary speakers, oral and poster presentations, sponsors and exhibitors, workshops and social events that promote knowledge exchange between the participants and proposes to share their research findings with a wide audience.
